## Bio

Andrew Masucci currently works as a Data and Policy Analyst at Acumen, LLC,
providing analytical and research support for the Center for Medicare and 
Medicaid Services (CMS) in the administration of the Outpatient Prospective Payment 
System (OPPS) and the Inpatient Psychiatric Facility Prospective Payment System
(IPF PPS). His professional and academic interests include population health, 
chronic disease epidemiology, and value-based care.
